snippet: Representative Steve Stockman, going up against the incumbent John Cornyn in the race for United States Senate, wants to be the next Ted Cruz, but several factors are working against him.
lead_paragraph: Representative Steve Stockman, going up against the incumbent John Cornyn in the race for United States Senate, wants to be the next Ted Cruz, but several factors are working against him.

headline.main: Testing if ‘Loud’ Can Add Votes for Insurgents
headline.print_headline: Testing if ‘Loud’ Can Add Votes For Insurgents
